turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Good afternoon. I was hoping to place a pickup order for Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me go ahead and get a

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande caffè latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can I go ahead and get soy milk in that, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, so you are ordering a grande caffe latte with soy milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I also make sure I can get a Splendas as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mixed in, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: on the side or mixed in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to pick up from 141 West 3rd Street in Fort Worth.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande caffe latte with soy milk and 2 splendas mixed in, to be picked up at the starbucks on 3rd street in fort worth, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. You've been incredibly helpful this afternoon. That's all I need for now. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
